employee.about: I disagree with all other commenter

If they don't know, that means we never told anyone. And if we never told anyone it means we never made it back. Hence we die down here. Just as a matter of deductive logic.

You think water moves fast? You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind. Like it knows it killed the world once and got a taste for murder.
**Hey you guys!** I can use [markdown](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/) in my description
